mosinstall.name: Extended Menu
mosinstall.author: Daniel Ecer
mosinstall.description:
This Extended Menu module displays a menu in a flexible way. Please visit de.siteof.de for more details.
To use this module don't forget to publish it (and probably unpublish the default mainmenu module).

(If you like this module please consider a donation.)

param.name: class_sfx
param.label: Menu Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the menu items

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: @spacer
param.label: ...[ source ]...
param.description: Parameters where to load menu items from.

param.name: menutype
param.label: Menu Name
param.description: The name of the menu (default is 'mainmenu')

param.name: menu_source_type
param.label: Source Type
param.description: Source type to use.

param.name: menu_source_value
param.label: Source Value
param.description: Ids depending on Source Type (section ids, category ids or content item ids - it is also possible to specify the name/alias instead).

param.name: menu_source_show_section
param.label: Show Section
param.description: Define which elements to should be linkable (if visible).

param.name: menu_source_show_category
param.label: Show Category
param.description: Define which elements to should be linkable (if visible).

param.name: menu_source_show_content_item
param.label: Show Content Item
param.description: Define which elements to should be linkable (if visible).

param.name: menu_source_order
param.label: Order
param.description: Define which elements to should be linkable (if visible).

param.name: default_content_itemid
param.label: Default Itemid
param.description: Defines a default menu item which is used for the content items to reduce duplicate URLs. (see also Resolve Itemid)

param.name: @spacer
param.label: ...[ style ]...
param.description: Parameters defining what kind of information to show (see also output).

param.name: menu_style
param.label: Menu Style
param.description: The menu style

param.name: menu_view_plugin_name
param.label: Menu View Plugin Name
param.description: The name of the menu view plugin you want to show.

param.name: menu_images
param.label: Show Menu Icons
param.description: Show the Menu Icons you have selected for your menu items

param.name: expand_menu
param.label: Expand Menu
param.description: Expand the menu and make its sub-menus items always visible

param.name: expand_min
param.label: Expand Until Level
param.description: All menu items until the given level will always be expanded.

param.name: max_depth
param.label: Maximum Depth
param.description: Levels with a level higher than the maximum depth will never be expanded.

param.name: hide_first
param.label: Hide First Entry
param.description: The first menu item will not be rendered. (This is useful when setting the first entry to what your home page should be, but you dont want it to show.)

param.name: show_parent
param.label: Show Parent
param.description: Shows the parent of the menu.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: ...[ split ]...
param.description: Parameters allowing to split a menu and display a menu partally.

param.name: parent_item
param.label: Parent Menu Item
param.description: The parent menu item (Itemid/Name) to use as the parent.

param.name: current_level_begin
param.label: Begin With Current Item Level
param.description: Begins with the level of the currently selected item.

param.name: level_begin
param.label: Begin With Level
param.description: Begins with a certain level/level - useful to split menu into different modules.

param.name: split_menu
param.label: Split Menu
param.description: The amount of levels/depth until a new menu within this module will be rendered.

param.name: menu_count
param.label: Menu Count
param.description: The amount of menus to render within this module.

param.name: query_cache
param.label: Enable Query Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the query of this module (may be useful for menus splitted into modules)

param.name: @spacer
param.label: ...[ output ]...
param.description: Additional parameters to control the output.

param.name: parse_access_key
param.label: Parse Access Key
param.description: Defines how to parse/strip the access key markup.

param.name: title_attribute
param.label: Link Title
param.description: A title attribute may be added to links (useful in combination to show the access key).

param.name: level_class
param.label: Level Class
param.description: Defines which level class should be applied (mainlevel/sublevel).

param.name: active_menu_class
param.label: Active Menu Class
param.description: Active menus may get the style class mainlevel_active/sublevel_active.

param.name: element_id
param.label: Element Id
param.description: Each element may get an id based on the hierarchy... for example menuitem_2_5 for the 5th sub menu item of the 2nd menu item. (Note: this conflicts with the active_menu id which will removed... use the above setting instead)

param.name: menu_template
param.label: Enable Menu Template
param.description: Enable Menu Template (patTemplate).

param.name: menu_template_name
param.label: Template Name
param.description: The patTemplate template to use (need to be in the current site templates directory).

param.name: @spacer
param.label: ...[ images ]...
param.description: Images to use for the Vertical menu style.

param.name: indent_image
param.label: Indent Image
param.description: Choose which indent image system to utilise

param.name: indent_image1
param.label: Indent Image 1
param.description: Image for the first sub-level

param.name: indent_image2
param.label: Indent Image 2
param.description: Image for the second sub-level

param.name: indent_image3
param.label: Indent Image 3
param.description: Image for the third sub-level

param.name: indent_image4
param.label: Indent Image 4
param.description: Image for the fourth sub-level

param.name: indent_image5
param.label: Indent Image 5
param.description: Image for the fifth sub-level

param.name: indent_image6
param.label: Indent Image 6
param.description: Image for the sixth sub-level

param.name: @spacer
param.label: ...[ horizontal spacer ]...
param.description: Spacer to use for the Horizontal menu style.

param.name: spacer
param.label: Spacer
param.description: Spacer for Horizontal menu

param.name: end_spacer
param.label: End Spacer
param.description: End Spacer for Horizontal menu

param.name: @spacer
param.label: ...[ select list ]...
param.description: Select List options.

param.name: select_list_submit_text
param.label: Select List Submit Text
param.description: Text for the submit button

param.name: select_list_submit_hide
param.label: Hide Submit Button
param.description: Defines whether the submit button should be hidden.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: ...[ misc ]...
param.description: Misc. options.

param.name: call_getitemid
param.label: Resolve Itemid By Content Item
param.description: Resolve Itemid by content item (calls getItemid)... set this to No if you want to link multiple times to the same content item.

param.name: current_item
param.label: Current/Active Item Highlighting
param.description: Define which item should be the current/active one - using the fastest but may not lead to the desired result.

param.name: current_item_duplicates
param.label: Current Item Duplicates
param.description: Defines what to do when duplicate items were found which would otherwise produce invalid HTML.

param.name: access_keys
param.label: Access Keys
param.description: Additional access key mapping (comma separated association of Itemid/Name=AK - without a left side the position is assumed, e.g. 1=1,exmenu=m,3).

param.name: exact_access_level
param.label: Exact Access Level
param.description: If set to yes, public menu items will be shown to when not logged in only.
